thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cucinelli happy with 4 pct like-for-like sales growth in coming years

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cucinelli happy with 4 pct like-for-like sales growth in coming years
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Italy’s Brunello Cucinelli Chief Executive tells analysts in post-results conference call:
* GROUP’S IDEA IS TO KEEP OPENING 3-5 NEW STORES EACH YEAR
* INVESTMENTS IN NEXT THREE YEARS MAINLY COMMERCIAL, FROM 2020 GROUP WILL HAVE TO START THINKING ABOUT WIDENING HEADQUARTERS
* “HAPPY” IF GROUP ABLE TO KEEP LIKE-FOR-LIKE GROWTH AT 4 PERCENT IN COMING YEARS Further company coverage: (Reporting by Milan newsroom)
